channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- VIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- VIOS

item.title: CVE-2021-29862|2024-08-03T22:18:03.205Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to cause a denial of service. IBM X-Force ID: 206086.

item.title: CVE-2021-29693|2024-08-03T22:18:02.467Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user that is in the with elevated group privileges to cause a denial of service due to a vulnerability in the lpd daemon. IBM X-Force ID: 200255.

item.title: CVE-2021-29801|2024-08-03T22:18:03.291Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the kernel to gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 203977.

item.title: CVE-2022-34356|2024-08-03T09:07:16.254Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, 7.3, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the AIX kernel to obtain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 230502.

item.title: CVE-2021-29860|2024-08-03T22:18:03.145Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a non-privileged local user to exploit a vulnerability in the libc.a library to expose sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 206084.

item.title: CVE-2021-29741|2024-08-03T22:18:02.913Z -- ibm -- vios
item.description: IBM AIX 7.1, 7.2, and VIOS 3.1 could allow a local user to exploit a vulnerability in Korn Shell (ksh) to gain root privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 201478.
